import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; class Monthly extends Component { render () { let result = []; let date = new Date( 2021, 4, 0); let lastDay = date.getDate(); for (let i=1; i<=lastDay; i++) { result.push( {[i]} ); } return (
対象年月 年 月 月間稼働時間 {} {' '}
{result}

); } } export default Monthly;
